attributes.action: Petition to reinstate The United Kingdom Warning and Monitoring Organisation (UKWMO) in case of the threat of nuclear war
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The U.K currently has no warning system in place should there be a threat of nuclear war. With today's 'war on terrorism' climate we are more at risk than ever from nuclear attack. An arly warning system like The United Kingdom Warning and Monitoring Organisation (UKWMO, abolished in 1992)would give us a better chance of survival by warning us of the attack first.
